snippet: There have been unconfirmed reports that the Rev. Paolo Dall’Oglio, who spent years promoting religious dialogue in Syria and championed the uprising, has been  killed.
abstract: Disappearance of Rev Paolo Dall’Oglio, Italian Jesuit priest who has spent decades promoting religious dialogue in Syria, is raising fears among Catholic leaders that he has been killed.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut, and Elisabetta Povoledo from Rome.

lead_paragraph: There have been unconfirmed reports that the Rev. Paolo Dall’Oglio, who spent years promoting religious dialogue in Syria and championed the uprising, has been  killed.

headline.main: Disappearance of Activist Priest in Syria Stirs Fears He Is Dead
headline.print_headline: Disappearance of Activist Priest in Syria Stirs Fears He Is Dead

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
